column4: can anyone help me install ispconfig? I'm going through the guide and want to make sure whether I can ignore an error I saw or not.
what was the error?
http://qazsteve.pastebin.com/d2d702dfa
I have no idea what htscanner.so does
you might want to ask the ispconfig people
where? I tried #ispconfig and it's invite only...
what is pear?
a fruit silly
its a redistrubution system for reusable php components
and framework
you do realize that ispconfig has their own support community you are offtopic
okay, but I'm worried that when I changed my php.ini 's I didn't do it right. I thought they might, but WHERE DO I GO?
I would look on the ispconfig page possibly the support sectioni
http://www.ispconfig.org/support.htm
maybe look for a channel on irc then that is about ispconfig rather than askign in #ubuntu
they would be able to better answer your questions than anyone here
sorry, I'm installing on ubuntu, so I started here.
anybody know anybody in #ispconfig that can get me an invite?
No i hear you. I've been there. I'm just trying to point you in the right direction. Chances of getting help on specific stuff like that here are slim to none.
especially with all this noob chatter. This chan is slammed to day
not really noob chatter but default support channel.
whatever, that's why I came, you never know what you're going to find.
